{"id":991790972,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2Â weeks","timestamp":1689076846,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"88 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/991790972/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Recover Binary Search Tree","memory":"16.7 MB","code":"# Definition for a binary tree node.\n# class TreeNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, left=None, right=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.left = left\n#         self.right = right\nclass Solution:\n    def recoverTree(self, root: Optional[TreeNode]) -> None:\n        \"\"\"\n        Do not return anything, modify root in-place instead.\n        \"\"\"\n        self.arr = []\n        def inorderTraversal(root):\n            if not root:\n                return\n            inorderTraversal(root.left)\n            self.arr.append(root)\n            inorderTraversal(root.right)\n        inorderTraversal(root)\n        sort = sorted(leaf.val for leaf in self.arr)\n        for i in range(len(sort)):\n            self.arr[i].val = sort[i]\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree","has_notes":false}
